Startup

Below are projects that I worked on as a co-founder of Studiolanes.

  • Camp - AI powered screenshot organizer; App Store
  • Marauder - Private location tracking; App Store
  • Shengji - Online implementation of Sheng ji; iOS & Android
  • Frames - Design feedback and collaboration tool
  • Campana - Competitive research & alerting tool, powered by LLMs
  • Campana - Blog - Blog where we write about lessons we learned while building Campana

Personal

  • VLCKit - libvlc bindings for OS X, iOS and tvOS in Objective-C (Google Summer of Code project)
  • xcperfect - xccov formatter, written in Ruby
  • Fix All Conflicts - command-line interface for fixing git merge conflicts, written in Go
  • CircularCrownSelector - Apple watchOS selection UI
  • LBaC-Swift - Let’s Build a Compiler translated to Swift Playgrounds
  • bitbuf - C API for creation and analysis of binary data
  • Paper - Jekyll theme used in my personal blog
  • This blog - Jekyll based blog deployed on Github Pages
  • Maroon - iOS app for Texas A&M University students
  • today - iOS app designed to simply your morning (blog post)
  • Habitats - iOS app for Habitats for Humanity shack bidding charity event
  • Word Sneak - iOS card game based on a segment from Late Night with Jimmy Fallon (blog post)

  • CrowdSense

Talks
